report_title: Electronic Access Control System Manufacturing in the US
executive_summary: The Electronic Access Control System Manufacturing industry produces smart cards, fingerprint scanners, biometric systems, and other access control systems, including keypads. The industry has recently been affected by volatile downstream markets, the effects of import penetration, and the outbreak of the pandemic. As a result, industry revenue has been declining at an annualized rate of 4.4% over the past five years and is expected to reach $3.7 billion in 2023, although this conceals significant year-to-year volatility. Industry profit has similarly fallen due to lower demand and high competition from foreign manufacturers, with profitability overall waning to 5.6%. Industry revenue is poised to undergo course correction in 2023, inclining 1.2% as macroeconomic conditions improve.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: The Pandemic Had a Profound Effect on Industry Revenue, Driven Largely by Declines in Nonresidential Construction and Corporate Profit
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Commercial construction markets represent a majority of industry revenue and any fluctuations in the value of nonresidential construction have a direct effect on this industry.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Demand for Electronic Access Control Systems is Volatile
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Residential consumers represent an emerging important consumer channel for the industry.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Domestic Products Struggle on the Global Stage
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Import penetration on domestic demand is a key point of influence for this industry.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Manufacturers Shift Priorities to Adapt to a Changing Landscape
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Companies in this industry are experiencing competition from domestic industries specializing in the security market.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Downstream Markets Are Expected To Expand
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The industry is expected to benefit from an increase in overall business activity as the economy recovers from the COVID-19 pandemic.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Favorable International Trade Trends Will Likely Benefit The Industry
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The depreciation of the US dollar will likely benefit this industry.
Discovering new technologies is essential to the success of this industry.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Rising Industry Participation and Stagnating Profit is Expected Over the Next Five Years
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Increasing demand from advanced biometric systems will likely require manufacturers to expand their research and development centers.

industry_definition: Companies in this industry manufacture electronic access control systems, including card-based (proximity cards and smart cards), audio-based.
key_trends: Growing external competition from low-cost imports continues to threaten domestic markets.
Reputation is a crucial point of differentiation.
The pandemic siphoned demand from commercial markets due to office vacancies.

market_segmentation.segment_description: The commercial market accounts for an estimated 58.7% of revenue.
The private property market accounts for an estimated 19.9% of industry revenue.
The government market accounts for an estimated 19.1% of industry revenue.

products_and_services.product_description: Demand for biometric systems has been actively growing.
An estimated 18.7% of industry revenue is generated by audio, keypad and other systems.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Corporate profit influences a business' ability to expand.

international_trade_points.trade_description: Imports of electronic access control systems have mounted.
In 2023, Mexico and China are slated to command the largest share of industry imports.
The value of exports in the industry has declined.
Amid the pandemic, industry exports were depleted.

business_locations.location_description: The West accounts for the most prominent portion of industry establishments.
The Mid-Atlantic is home to a significant share of industry establishments.
An estimated 20% of industry establishments are located in the Southeast.

regulations_points.regulation_description: Industry manufacturers must comply with FCC regulations.
Industry manufacturers must also comply with regulations regarding conflict minerals.
Policies to reduce the spread of the disease have been introduced.

barriers_points.barrier_description: The industry is in a mature life cycle stage.
The industry has a high level of revenue volatility.
The industry has a low and steady level of assistance.

basis_points.basis_description: The competition is intensifying due to growing external competition.
Reputation is a crucial differentiating factor in this industry.
Manufacturers can also cater to niche markets.

concentration_points.concentration_description: The top manufacturers will hold a combined share of less than 20.0%.
Only Honeywell International commands a significant market share.
Small enterprises typically specialize in manufacturing products for a niche area.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: The cost of materials represents the largest expense.
The price and supply of semiconductors has been significantly disrupted.
The recently enacted CHIPS act could benefit the industry.
Employee compensation is the second-largest expense.
Labor costs account for an estimated 23.1% of revenue.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The capital intensity for the industry is low.
Manufacturers can outsource production to low-wage countries.
Manufacturers specializing in high-end products must invest heavily.

volatility_points.volatility_description: The pandemic amplified the industry's downward trend.
A decline in the value of private nonresidential construction resulted in decreased demand.
The industry should benefit from increased device connectivity.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Smartphones will be a major area of technological innovation.
As the number of businesses rises, demand for advanced products will increase.
